content.title: AAA Risk Factors
content.definition: Major risk factors include age >65, male sex, smoking, hypertension, family history, and connective tissue disorders.
content.statement: AAA Risk Factors is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Aaa that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding AAA Risk Factors helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of AAA Risk Factors include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of AAA Risk Factors.

clinical_pearls: Key point about AAA Risk Factors
